mapper.insert: insert into yomul_vendors(no, owner, name, category, info, tel, addr) values('V'||yomul_vendors_no_seq.nextval, #{owner}, #{name}, #{category}, #{info}, #{tel}, #{addr})
mapper.select: select count(*) from yomul_vendor_customers where vendor_no = #{no} group by vendor_no
mapper.delete: delete from yomul_vendor_customers where vendor_no = #{vno} and customer_no = #{cno}
mapper.select: select no, owner, name, category, info, tel, addr, news, customers, reviews from v_y_vendors where name like('%' || #{name} || '%')
